Meeko Chin says: March 2, 2012 at 6:08 am I am rather disappointed with McDonald’s at Sandakan outlet. I have been telling all my friends that Fillet O Fish is an all time favourite. In fact, the cheese burger and others are also an all time favourite. When I ordered fillet o fish a week ago, I had a very overdone piece of fish fillet–worse still, the piece of cheese came to me in less than half! However, I still went back on Sunday afternoon for a drink and a bite. I ordered oreo McFlurry. To my dismay, my friends and I were lamenting over the icy ice-cream. All we tasted was ice and not much cream at all. Another blow to our already disappointed state. My friends and I really hope that something should be done with the food quality. And hopefully, more could be done to lessen the queue at the counters. It is not too properly organized. Cheers.
